CodeExample.Title: Call the item/createLink action
CodeExample.Summary: To call the item/createLink action,submit a POST request of the following REST call syntax.
CodeExample.Request:
POST /<version>/myOrganization/drives/<drive.id>/files/<item.id>/createLink HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose Content-Length : <body_length>
{ type : <Edm.String> }

Remarks.string: A successful call to the item/createLink action returns an instance of the Microsoft.Graph.permission type.
